      • createType

        @Transactional
public void createType(AnnotationType aType)
        Description copied from interface: AnnotationService
        creates a type which will be a span or arc(relation) type. Currently the annotation types are highly highly tied with the tagsets, one tagset per type. POS, Names Entity, and coreference links are span types while coreference chains and dependency parsings are arc(relation) types.
        Specified by:
        createType in interface AnnotationService
